website_summaries.verdict: This Bluetooth headset is easy to use, provides high quality sound on both ends, and has solid battery life.
pros: Has convenient charging indicator light directly on headset
Set charges quickly, in about 2 hours
Easy to adjust headphone to fit ears
Volume can be adjusted easily and gets plenty loud
Simple to pair with any Bluetooth enabled device
cons: Status beeps and call notification volume is not adjustable and can be quite loud

website_summaries.verdict: An affordable Bluetooth headset that's fairly basic and has good sound, but the style isn't for everyone or practical for all uses.
pros: A good pick for work or travel, as it offers a secure, over-the-ear design that is also lightweight and comfortable
Has surprisingly clear sound quality considering the budget-friendly price
cons: Doesn't cancel sound very well in all settings
Doesn't live up to the advertised battery life – gets about 4 or 5 hours with standard use
Tends to fit tightly on larger individuals

customer_reviews.title: Truck drives will love this.!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well I'm surprised,I'm a truck driver and definitely works great and you can't even beat the price absolutely nothing to regret! Is not heavy, fits perfect on your head and it doesn't even hurt your ear, perfect hearing and noise cancellation is great, no doubt i spend my money on something that works great! I bought 2 no regrets!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: iFROSTY

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: I might get 40 minutes of talk time before it disconnects and needs to be recharged...perhaps I just have a faulty one. There is no audible feedback when BT disconnects occur (which is a dealbreaker when the headset disconnects as often as this one does), no convenient mute button on the headset (or perhaps my phone mis-maps the button as On/Off?). YMMV but IMO...use the $ to buy something with more features and a better mic...one that is not so sensitive to 2.4GHz interference. Perhaps you literally need to be a truck driver, out in the middle of nowhere for this to work as advertised?
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've searched high and low for the perfect bluetooth to use while driving. Most of them suck. They're small and the microphone doesn't get close enough to your mouth and the other person complains because all they hear is road noise. Others don't get loud enough in the ear, or fit awkwardly, I have small ear canals so "in ear" type headphones or ear pieces don't actually fit in my ear. I even tried a wired headset that didn't get loud enough to hear over the road noise. This is the perfect headset. It gets plenty loud. It fits nicely over my ear. The other person doesn't complain at all about call clarity. I'm glad I tried it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Earpiece runs small
customer_reviews.text: Product was an easy set-up. This is a right sided ear headset only. The sound through the earpiece is clear. I purchased this item because I’m working remote from home and wanted a headset with mic noise cancellation. Unfortunately callers could still hear the noise in my background. Callers had no complaints about hearing me clearly, so that’s a plus. Also, the headpiece was a little tight and didn’t fit comfortably on my ear, so I would find myself taking it off after a call. I think this would be comfortable for people with small heads such as children.
customer_reviews.author: Hoaka1

customer_reviews.title: Nice headset. Connects easily (but be aware that...)
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good. Connects easily and automatically. Easy to set up. Have only used with iphone (no VOIP etc), but no problems with dropping calls etc. I would recommend. UPDATE: note that the seller offers a $10 gift card if you leave a 5 star positive review and send them a screenshot, so take all the 5*s with a grain of salt. That being said, I stand by my review. I actually like it even better now that my kid has also had great success using it w his laptop for remote school classes.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this headset
customer_reviews.text: I have used this Mpow Pro Trucker Bluetooth Headset for a few weeks now and I get the same complaint, people cannot hear me. They say I sound too far away and very quiet. I tried to put the mic right in front of my mouth but no difference. I have an update on my review. The company sent me a replacement headset without me even asking. The replacement works great. I am very impress with this companies effort to satisfy their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Greg

customer_reviews.title: Best headset I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headset. Probably the best headset I've purchased for my office or headset period. It's very comfortable! and that is important for me as i work long office and phone confernce hours so this was perfect, the reception is super clear, and the range is wonderful it goes prettyyyyyy far no static or loss of connection. I even use this for out of office days in starbucks working on my laptop. Worth every penny! Should be priced higher.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Forde

customer_reviews.title: Good price***Updated Review**
customer_reviews.text: The headset was uncomfortable and disconnects in the middle of using. ***UPDATED REVIEW*** The company sent me a replacement product. I was not expecting that but it was so very appreciated! The replacement product works exactly as described, I am very happy with it and would recommend to others. Great customer service, and they were very quick to remedy the situation. I have been using this set daily, and I love it because it is lightweight, others can hear me well, and the battery lasts a couple of days before I need to charge it. Thank you much to the seller, I am a happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: walden

customer_reviews.title: Virtual Teaching must have
customer_reviews.text: I’m a middle school science teacher, teaching online from home due to COVID. These are a must have and have made my lessons run smoother especially when it comes time to do lab experiments. I can move around and demo the lab w/o worrying about my voice fading in/out. I started out teaching with my AirPods but my the end of the school day they were almost dead and I would have to wait to charge them before going out for my “get me out this house” walk.
customer_reviews.author: Summer09

customer_reviews.title: It works, but has some flaws...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It works according to the description. I had no issues pairing it to my laptop and works find with GoTo Meeting, Skype, and Mitel applications. Call quality was clear and no one complained of far off background noise. Cons: The ear cushion is much smaller than it appears. Also, I am returning mine because there is a faint beeping sound when a call is not active. My other headsets are completely silent when not in use, so this really bothers me. If you work in a noisy office or are on the road, then you most likely won't even hear the beeping (it is very faint). However, I work from home and its completely quiet.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pack

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprise for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this headset for a little over a week now and I am extremely happy with my purchase. I’m on a budget and decided to give this a chance. Sound quality is good, connects to my iPhone easily, it cancels out background noise. The headset itself was a little tight and I’m a small person, I carefully stretched it in a few spots and now it’s perfect. Battery life seems good, I do charge it for 30 mins during my lunch break and overnight. (I work 7 hrs/day)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: This headset is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for telework and also personal calls. It's very easy to set up. Tip: turn on the headset first, then turn on bluetooth on your phone and it will connect. When you finish using, turn off the headset, it will still be connected to phone for next call. The battery charge on this phone lasts a very long time. My longest call has been 3 hours and it was terrific. I would highly recommend this headset.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction, terrible outgoing audio.
customer_reviews.text: The reviews for this product were so outstanding it was a no brainer to buy. Connecting to my two cell phones was incredibly easy. HOWEVER, making calls (from either phone) resulted in recipients hearing static with any noise transmition; they heard static when I talked, and they heard static when they talked. The static wasn't overpowering, but highly annoying. The outgoing audio quality was also hollow sounding (heard by recipients). I returned the headset the same day it arrived. VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: tracer

customer_reviews.title: CONSTANT IMPROVEMENT IN TECHNOLOGY
customer_reviews.text: I have used and depended Plantronics headsets for over 25 years, and as a licensed stockbroker, have used and required good headsets for 40 years. The ability to communicate well over a variety of phone systems has always been 0ne of the most important aspects of my career. I chose the Mpow Pro Trucker Bluetooth Headset V5.0, Wireless Headphones to experiment with and the results are excellent and exceed anything I have used previously. Mpow appears to be one of the lowest cost excellent quality headsets on the market. Next week, 8/10/20, I will be using the Mpow 059 Pro Bluetooth Headphones Over Ear, Upgraded to 60Hrs Playtime.
customer_reviews.author: purchaser

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: My headset arrived this afternoon. It's charged quickly, was very easy to pair with my phone and laptop. I've been listening to music for a couple of hours. Sounds quality is very good. It is impossible to test nose cancellation since one ear is exposed (what I need as I'll be using this at work.) It is a little tight on my head, but I assume that it can be adjusted, so I'm not marking down for that.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: It's my second MPOW Bluetooth product, satisfied again!
customer_reviews.text: Had one MPOW Bluetooth earphone about 5 years, still working perfectly. So when I am searching for a headset with laptop video call, no doubt go buy another MPOW. - The headset's noise canceling is still outstanding; - Battery life is excellent; - Sound Quality for phone and conference/video call is quite good; - Bluetooth working distance of the headset is better than previous version of earphone. - Gently cover the ear without invading in or completely sealed your ear makes long wearing comfortable. If you are looking for an office/professional level reliable earphone or headset, MPOW is your choice.
customer_reviews.author: Sean H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, I will buy another one!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend it!! I purchased this for my father as a replacement to one that he has been using for some time now. He wanted something similar but after getting this Particular headphone, he is beyond pleased. As per him,This is the best set of headphone for people who are on the road a lot because of excellent noise cancellation feature. the call volume is great. He is yet to figure out other features but he already likes it so much that he uses it while he is at home because if it’s comfort and convenience.
customer_reviews.author: SIM KAUR

customer_reviews.title: Loud, clear, perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Other bluetooth headsets I have tried had very low volume, making it hard to hear the person on the other end. I gave up for years due to this. Finally I tried this, and I am impressed. Loud, clear audio, and the other people I speak with say I sound perfect, loud and clear. The over-the-head band is comfortable with a nice rubberized foot which sets against the ear, making a nice secure fit. The cushioned speaker is comfortable, and the buttons are easy to use. This was on sale for $21, and the headset came with a $10 Amazon gift card in the box. I'm extremely pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MIC

customer_reviews.title: Does not pair with a MacBook Pro and iPhone simultaneously
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: I've updated my score due to a great interaction with Mpow's customer support. There aren't many companies that'll go out of their way to ensure customer satisfaction, but Mpow reached out to me to make it right. I think it's fair to say that if you run into an issue with one of their products, they'll get the issue resolved for you. === The description says it can connect to two devices at once, which I assume means it can pair with two devices at once, but it can't do that. Once you have paired to one device, it will not pair to another. This was my primary use case in buying this headset.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for using your cell phone as your work phone!
customer_reviews.text: I've been working from home since the pandemic started, and trying to put my cell phone on my shoulder to type while talking was a pain. I put people on mute, hung up on them - you name it. I ordered this headset, because I didn't want something that would hang on my ear. That being said, it could loosen up some - as it will hurt my ear if placed in the wrong area. I've come up with a placement that works - but it took trial/error. I definitely think this will hold up, and it has great talk time. Very easy to figure out and so simple to use. Very happy to have this!
customer_reviews.author: Jagroo

customer_reviews.title: Not a noise cancelling headset.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for everyday phone calls and they are constantly in use. Sadly they are not good headset at all. The noise cancelling is terrible, if any at all. People complain they can hear everything I do. I would be washing dishes and the sound coming through to the other side sounds like shattering glass. I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore C.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly. It's a bargain for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is unfortunate because It functions very well. The problem is the talktime is only about an hour. The battery also died in standby after only a day. It may be that the battery in this particular unit is defective. I've had a variety of personal bluetooth devices ranging from earbuds to full size headphones for music. I have never experienced a battery capacity this bad. After seeing my review, the manufacturer replaced the product. It does appear that the original item simply had a bad battery, which was out of their control. The new item works perfectly and is a bargain for the price. As such I have updated my review to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bob454

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product at the perfect time
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher and we have to figure out how to teach 20 kids in the classroom and 20 at home online. My laptop and other external microphones have not done the trick because when you slightly turn they don't pick up the sound. With this headset I can move around the room and students can hear me in class and at home. The quality is very good and the reach is excellent. I will be recommending this to my fellow teachers as a way to navigate teaching in the age of pandemics.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, clear and easy to acess controls
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this item. It came packaged well. The directions could be better in how to operate it. But I've been using it for a day now and it is extremely comfortable. The earpiece remains comfortable even after having it on my ear for 30minutes. The sound quality is superior and I'm told that my voice is crystal clear on the other end (according to five friends/coworkers). I give it a 4-star now, only because I don't know the durablity of the product yet of course. But in all other aspects now it is a 5-STAR.
customer_reviews.author: Jim2day

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: They work well for the price. I’m using them for Skype calls from my laptop. They’re a little tight, but I do have a big head. The ear-part is a little cheap, but good enough. I also wish I could mute from the headset. Update: after a few months, they sometimes shutoff during a call. Other than that, they’re okay. Update: after 4 months of about 25-30 hours of use each week, the ear piece is starting to fall apart—see picture. Update to my update, I was able to re-secure the ear cover using a little screw driver.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound - reasonable price - cordless is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I use a headset a lot with multiple devices, and I have wired headphones. Lately the wire has been an issue, as it gets caught on stuff and has messed up the plug on yet another pair. I have avoided bluetooth cause of past issues with pairing and really not great range. But I have to say, these work GREAT! I have paired them with 3 different devices and it remembers them all great. Range is decent and battery life is good too. Am considering a second pair for in the car, as I keep forgetting these in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Suze in Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Works, but sound quality muddled and poor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset to replace an older model MPOW headset that I had inadvertently broken. I loved that headset; it was comfortable and the sound was clear and excellent. This one, not so much. It's almost as comfortable, but the sound is muddled and unclear. It's difficult to understand callers on this headset. I thought at first perhaps it was just a connection issue with one caller; however, the muddy sound is part and parcel of every call. I don't like this unit and I plan to send it back. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A. Schar

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality, but could be louder.
customer_reviews.text: What I like: Lightweight, one button answering, one button calling (with iPhone Siri). Callers say that my voice is clear, and background noises are not loud for them. Room for improvement: highest volume could be louder. No trouble hearing callers, but at max volume (and I am slightly hard of hearing when background noise is present), sometimes I have to ask caller to repeat things. Overall, happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DonB!

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these...actually ordered one a few years ago, hated it, and tossed it in a drawer. Recently needed a second headset so decided to get this one (forgetting I had already tried one). HATE it. Sound quality is muffled, and I can barely understand what the other person is saying. Tried it on several different phones, called several different people all with the same result. This one goes in the junk drawer with the other one. Sure would like to find a GOOD bluetooth headset that has clear sound!
customer_reviews.author: P. N. P. D.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service!  And the M5 is a solid headset!
customer_reviews.text: Need to update my review....after receiving the first headset which I wasn't happy with, Bella from their customer service proactively reached out to me and informed me that they wanted to ensure my satisfaction and there was a newer model they would ship out. Just received and wow, what a difference! The M5 version is incredible! Perfect sound and folks have said that I sound like I am right next to them in the room. This is now my new goto bluetooth headset when working from home. Amazing customer service and great product. A big thank you to Bella and already recommending this headset to others.
customer_reviews.author: Rob DeVenuto

customer_reviews.title: Good customer support
customer_reviews.text: I returned my original and was sent a replacement. Sound quality is excellent even in the wind. It does take a while to get accustomed to having it cover your ear. As a senior I have not adjusted to the on/off button location and on occasion drop a call....or maybe I'm just tired of talking to the other person:) I'm told by others that the sound is far better than on the previous 4-headsets I've owned. All have been surprised when I tell them I'm using a headset. I also hear them better. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Roe

customer_reviews.title: Only for phone calls not media!
customer_reviews.text: So this headset is great! It works very good and it is great for people on the other end not saying... “what? I can’t hear you, you sound so far away”! I cannot tell you how many Bluetooth headsets that people have said that to me! One caveat, it only works for talk, no media. it says so in the description... But I failed to read that! That was my bad, definitely works as described! It is really great for when driving in the car or chatting with somebody while working around the house!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Louise

customer_reviews.title: Below average sound quality & comfort, replacement unit better
customer_reviews.text: Okay product for periodic use. Not recommended for business, daily use or long conference calls. I was disappointed that battery did not last a full work day. I had to recharge twice during a normal 8 hr work day after two 1.5 hour calls. Also, the microphone voice quality sounds like you are talking into a soup can and you end up repeating myself so that other could clearly understand my words. The ear foam piece is not very comfortable. Finally just reverted back to my old corded device. Update: The new replacement model is far superior to the old model. Sound is clearer and more comfortable. Battery life more acceptable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Firmdesires

customer_reviews.title: My second one.
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is the best headset I've had. I drive a noisy semi and I have invested hundreds on the blue parrot and other name brand headsets that as soon as the warranty is up they quit. This is my second one of these in the last 2.5 years and the first one still works It was just getting old. I still carry it for a back up spending 20 bucks now is better than a 2700 hundred dollar ticket for not having a one touch hands free device. The only bad thing it doesn't come with a wind sock. I found the perfect size on amazon package of 5 for less than $10
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Replacement unit works good.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Sound quality is poor. Can't hardly carry on a conversation. Plus, it is phone ONLY, no media like gps directions. UPDATED REVIEW.. After my scathing review of this product, the support team contacted me, and asked me to try their product AFTER a firmware update. They sent me a new unit, that did not look like the original, and performance was much better, AND it played media as well as phone. Sound quality was much improved. For the under $30 price tag it works great, now
customer_reviews.author: fairreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this in my car for the last couple of months. I got it after a co-worker bought one and I couldn't tell that she was driving when I talked to her. The sound quality on the other end is amazing. I have no complaints other than the fact that I wish I had got one that covered both ears so I could hear a little better. That's not really an option for me, however, since I think having both ears covered while driving is illegal in my state. It's not a downfall of the product...just my loud car and failing hearing. For less than $20, this is a great product. You can't really go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: JH1986

customer_reviews.title: Sleek wireless headset
customer_reviews.text: Unwrapped it and thought it looked cheap as far as the headset part. It actually works like a charm has a two hour battery charge to last 12 hours. I can take calls working from home or use this with my phone while I walk around the house ! I love that it it lightweight and sleek. It is convenient and I got added perks through the company! The sound quality is nice and it has great volume control as you can adjust with a push of a button
customer_reviews.author: ClassSass

customer_reviews.title: Constant scratching, clicking noise for other caller
customer_reviews.text: There is a constant scratching, clicking sound for the other caller. It works great for the user but not pleasant for the person on other end. I have tried it off and on over past 6 months with out letting my daily long distance friend know and knows within 2 minutes that there is constant background noise. Must be some type of cross talk in the unit with the Bluetooth connection? Wish I could return it because I just won’t use it with this issue. I do love the feature to communicate with my iPhone to create to do lists with Siri.
customer_reviews.author: Mark @ Brew's

customer_reviews.title: Saved me from having to use speaker-phone constantly
customer_reviews.text: My phone's microphone went kaput after only a year of owning it. I can only hear the caller if I have them on speaker, which I find incredibly annoying. I was told by Google (it's a Google Pixel) that I'd need to send the phone to them for repair. I can't be without my phone 7-10 business days (as they stated). So, I figured I'd try this out. It has been life-changing. I can hear the caller clearly and the caller can hear me. Problem fixed and it only cost me $18. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Work at Home
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new device for work from home and this was absolutely perfect. Callers said my voice was clear, as if I had no blue tooth device at all! Additionally, neighborhood noises (lawnmower, cars, construction) were not heard by callers. I have never had it die after a full day of calls and audio. I charge it nightly, so I'm not sure how long it'll actually last, but works well for my 8 hr shift. I have connected this to iphone, Android, and a computer. You can attach two devices at once.
customer_reviews.author: Tess Hopson

customer_reviews.title: Not for those with sensitive scalps or prone to headaches
customer_reviews.text: I saw reviews stating that this was not for those with large heads and ignored them, because I don't have a large head. However, I do have a sensitive scalp and will get terrible headaches if too much pressure is concentrated in one place at one time. This has never before been an issue with any other headset I've ever used, but it is with this one. There is no way to make this comfortable or even bearable. I tried stretching it out, but it made little difference.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Although I liked this (especially given the price), it did not hold up to daily use after about 6 months. It broke from sheer use of putting it off and on my head constantly. I upgraded to a much more durable product (which was a lot more expensive, too). Overall, it delivered what it was supposed to accomplish. It just didn't hold up. And for something to remain cheap and light, I don't think there's a way to engineer it to hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Snell

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality of sound
customer_reviews.text: I hate giving bad reviews and always give products the benefit of the doubt. But I purchased this headset so that I could talk with clients without using my ear bud/built in microphone. Was very disappointed that all my incoming calls sounded fuzzy and that my clients complained about the same issue. Can't tolerate poor quality for normal calls. I assume for busy truckers this might be adequate, but as a daily replacement in a quiet office, can't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: David Greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Surprising quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought one for her work and then convinced me to give one a try. I have been on several work calls for hours on end and have had no issues at all. The battery holds up for a surprising amount of time. It's at 80% after all the use I've put it through on the first charge. The connectivity with my phone is flawless, too. The only gripe I have is no mute button but it doesn't claim to have one and I can use my phone.
customer_reviews.author: surrealfrog

customer_reviews.title: Low price and quality? YES!
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised with the quality. For the price I was very apprehensive to buy. But also for the price I had try. Glad I did!! I drive a dump truck and the in ear bluetooth I use wasn't cutting it. The road noise/truck noise made it frustrating to hold a conversation. With this head set i can actually hear and be heard. My second concern was level of comfort. Well, these are extremely lightweight. You don't realize there on your head. For the price and quality you really can't go wrong. AND you get a 2 year warranty!! There really is no downside. Give em a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality on both ends.  HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in hope of finding something more comfortable for long calls then the painful headphones that come with the Iphone. Sound quality is so poor I will put up with the pain of the headphones that came with the phone. ****After using for a few days I came back to remove a star from my rating. Not only is the sound I hear of poor quality, the microphone is also of poor quality and callers say it sound like I am in an echo chamber. HORRIBLE PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: DEG

customer_reviews.title: Works well for quiet rooms
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it's hard to hear on it if I have a fan on, but perfect for a quiet room. Just wish the volume was louder or the speaker quality better. Update:The seller sent me a replacement headset which I have linked here. This is a much better version and works excellent. The only issue I have with the new headset is that the call disconnect button was moved from the earpiece to the end of the mouthpiece, so it's difficult to use to disconnect a call. Other than that, this is an excellent new headset.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy C. Newell

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing 🙁
customer_reviews.text: Highly disappointed in this head set! After numerous tries and even purchasing a separate Bluetooth adapter, head set still failed to work and will not pair with my desk top that runs Windows 10; despite the advertising saying it will work with windows 10 software! I wish I could get a refund!
customer_reviews.author: M. Payton

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Great little piece. Charged well and easy. Quick to connect to bluetooth. Was able to walk across the house and still be connected without breakup. Others could hear me well even with dogs barking in the background. It is a bit tight on the head. I have a small head so I cant imagine how it would be with someone with a larger head. I adjust it often so It doesn't put pressure in one spot for too long.
customer_reviews.author: Elisha

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and volume control not so great. "Bribed" reviews, as well
customer_reviews.text: This had great ratings---and one finds out why when one opens the box---a card saying "Amazon gift certificate" for leaving a review. Amazon should not allow this, it really makes the reviews untrustworthy. But I decided to at least try it---put it one, it paired ok, but after about ten minutes it was very uncomfortable to wear. I wanted it to be able to take phone calls, but the volume was not sufficient so I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: texellence

customer_reviews.title: Evaluation after 3 months - Noise cancellation doesn’t seem to work any longer?
customer_reviews.text: This headset started off great! The noise cancellation worked very well to begin, but after a few months my listeners complain of being on speaker phone and loud echoes. This withstanding, I cannot complain about the quality on my end. Words are clear and volume is great. It’s just the issue with the people with whom I’m speaking complaining of background noise and sound whirring. The charge is still very impressive. I think I’ve charged the headset 3 total times, and I’ve never had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  Impressed!  Great sound quality, very reliable, easy to pair, and long battery life.
customer_reviews.text: I will admit, my expectations were low. Just needed something basic for occasional use. But this has exceeded expectations big time! Works flawlessly. Have now been using every day since temporarily working from home, and had zero problems. Get hours of talk time on a charge. Sound quality is great, and people I talk to say it sounds great on their end too. Very impressed and happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wally

customer_reviews.title: OK for a cheap bluetooth headset, don't expect too much in the way of sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Acceptable for the price. The sound quality is OK. I can hear the other party and they can hear me, but it's not near as nice as my corded headset. The battery life seems to be good thus far and I like that I can charge it with a regular micro usb cable. Overall, it's OK, but nothing I'm terribly impressed by. Edit: I'll leave my review for this one at 3 stars, but I will add that a Patozon representative did reach out to me after this review and resolved the issue by sending me a new headset of the newer model that did work much better.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, comfortable, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset for my wife, who bemoaned the fact that our old cordless phone had been able to use a headset, so she could do housework while chatting with friends, but her cell phone didn't have one. A quick search turned up this headset. She LOVES it! The clarity is very good, much better than when using the phone by itself. It's lightweight and stays in place as she moves about, and the talk time is plenty even if several of her long winded friends call back to back. It's very simple and straightforward to use. (I did do the initial pairing for her, but it's very easy to do) Definitely a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: There’s good and bad with this headset
customer_reviews.text: I guess for the price the headset is a good buy. The volume is good and it’s comfortable on the head. The only thing I dislike about it is that it doesn’t tell you how much talk time you have when you put it on and turn it on. The description says it has 12 hrs talk time, but I’ve had the battery go dead after 4hrs of continuous conversation. Which means if you’re anticipating a long call, you need to charge it (takes 2hrs) beforehand. It does beep when it’s about to go dead, but it would be great to know ahead of time. Like before you make a call.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Coy

customer_reviews.title: Constantly disconnecting
customer_reviews.text: This headset is disconnecting constantly. I do IT call center work, and bought this so that I do not have to be tethered to my computer but will still receive incoming calls. I only wanted to be able to walk around the room the computer is in (to stand up, do stretches, get my blood moving, etc) so I am no more than 5-10 feet away from the computer it is paired with. Unfortunately my return window has closed so I guess its just going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Carder

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking, Just buy this it works great.
customer_reviews.text: If you want to increase your productivity, don't even bother to read this review, just buy this headset. Finally, I have something that works and it works well. I've tried everything including something that I lease through my cell provider that mounts on my sun visor. With this item, not ONE person has asked me to repeat something. It's very refreshing indeed. I'm now using it in my office connected to my iPhone and calling out via wifi. Amazing. I have two hands free when entering notes into the computer while on a conversation. The price point for this item is also interesting. I would have paid more for it. It feels like a professional headset. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Averyr

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Volume control is tiny to touch but I just control from phone and that’s fine. I use this to work remotely at home To be hands free while I make calls. I’m never going far from my phone. I love this it’s loud and clear and battery lasts very long after constant calls back to back in an 8 hour day. I charge overnight every night. I’ve never had signal drop but again I’m just using in a home staying well within range of my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: New version way better than
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE. Version 6 was sent proactively by the company...pretty impressed by that. The new unit is way better and I am using it. Battery life is excellent. Sound is good. So why not 5 stars? The headset is huge. The metal band must have been designed for gigantic heads. I took it apart and shortened the band but about 1.5 inches. It fits great now. One small comment. The foam pad is a little firm and causes some discomfort after a full day. that seems to be diminishing as it breaks in
customer_reviews.author: msnechelon

customer_reviews.title: friend loves it !
customer_reviews.text: this was ordered as a gift . so i will relate what i've been told by the gift receiver . the lady who this was a gift for is a senior and she had told me she loves how easy this set is to operate , she like the long battery life , and it's a perfect fit for her ! she really loves how it allows her to talk on her phone while being hands free to do other thing ! i highly recommend for yourself or as a gift !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've own this headset for close to 2 years now and here is my honest opinion. First and for most the price is unbeatable. It use to last around 12 hours new, today is about 10 after 2 years which is not bad. I use it 5-6 days a week constant for more than 6 hours a day. All in all if you need something cheap and talk on the phone don't think twice. I'm holding it to see how long it will last. 2 years and for me it already paid itself off.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Liked it out of the box except.....
customer_reviews.text: The ear piece is very small and uncomfortable, I could only wear it for a couple of hours and had to switch back to my corded headset. I really liked the headset, it paired quickly to my iPhone 7 and my laptop. The sound quality was ok, not stereo quality but that is not what I bought it for. I needed a wireless headset for work as I move around a lot and don't like to be restricted. Unfortunately this one is not fitting the bill and I will be returning. I also just found out it will cost me $5.99 to return this item which is very disappointing, definitely will not buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: trc

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Broke
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 3 stars because the plastic that hold the metal head adjustment broke. I taped it so it works for a while and then I have to re-tape it. The volume + and - are near impossible to locate and use when it is on my head and I am driving. Other than those two issues, it is a great BT head set. I have revised to 5 Stars. At no charge they sent me a replacement. However, I do not care for the new model. The call button is hard to locate and too small, while I am driving. But great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: First one worked approx. 50% of time. 50% time silent. 2nd one works fine.
customer_reviews.text: After first one didn't work and I sent it back, vendor sent a new one at no charge. (There was a hassle in shipping, partly their fault, partly fault of my bldg. or usps.) The new one works fine so I upgraded my rating slightly. I don't know if my first one was unusual in its defection or if 2nd one I was sent was specially tested and verified to be good. You need to read others' reviews to determine that. Still a low rating because this has been a hassle and I like products to work right the first time, not after vendor sends me a 2nd.
customer_reviews.author: WestCoastReader

customer_reviews.title: Distance Teaching
customer_reviews.text: I am using these headphones to teach from home with Google Meets. The headphones work great. The Bluetooth was easy to connect to both my chromebook and my netbook. My students say they can hear me much better now and that background noise is less noticeable. I can hear them just fine also. I like that one ear is uncovered because I can still hear my daughter working. These were a win win for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jeaninne L Doyle Cavazos

customer_reviews.title: Great Price good quality
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other BT headsets to work with my computer for meetings and MPOW so far offers the best voice audio quality at a very reasonable price. My only complaint is it a little small for my big head. It becomes uncomfortable after a short period of time (30 minutes). I'm trying to bend it slightly to take the pressure off my ear. It's worked well with Cisco WebEx, Zoom, Google Meet, and MS Teams not trouble assigning it to those meetings for audio/mic.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Mosier

customer_reviews.title: Fully Charge it before trying to use
customer_reviews.text: My product sipped with a free 2 year extension, not sure if that is standard or not. But to activate it I have to leave a review. I JUST got this product. I've had 2 calls on it, 1 was fine, 1 was horrible audio quality (which could have been the other person's phone). I'll do a real review once I've had time to use it. It does seem to disconnect bluetooth every time I plug it in to charge (easy reconnect just annoying if you answer expecting it to still be synced). But once charged I'm hoping it's seamless use all day as it claims to have a 12hr battery life
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very nice device, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: This works really well for me. I bought it for two reasons. One is that my reception on my phone makes it so that it's sometimes hard to hear. This device really helps with that. Works well and that both my hearing conversation from someone else and their hearing my conversation is very good. Happy with the product happy with the price. Since I also plan to use the device with the top down on my convertible, where the Bluetooth connection might have to compete with the road noise, I wish that the microphone came with some sort of a foam cover to lessen wind noise. If one is available I'll be happy to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Brer Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Easy-to-use hands-free headset
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this headset to use with my personal laptop and smartphone when we all had to shift to working from home, and I was hosting Zoom meetings with students (I teach at the university level). The headset mic makes it easier for my students to hear me in meetings, and the Bluetooth was a cinch to pair with both my laptop and my phone. The one-ear design is good for me, making so I can clearly hear other users in the meeting, while still being aware of noise that might be coming from my own environment. Seems to hold a charge for quite some time; I only recharge every few days.
customer_reviews.author: Myra Dugan

customer_reviews.title: Pairing issue-fixed in the new model.
customer_reviews.text: New Update: MPow sent me a replacement, this model has fixed the pairing issue. They have also made some good ergonomic improvements. The mic boom has a nice tactile feel and the volume buttons are better placed and are easier to use. I also appreciate their customer service for reaching out to me on my concerns. I'd recommend the new model, and increasing my rating to 5-stars. My previous update: This headset has a problem with pairing. I was able to do it once (iPhone-6), but had to try for at least 30 minutes, but otherwise it's a hit or miss
customer_reviews.author: Mercury

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to, and more with a little help...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with third party navigation software that runs on my Android phone. I wanted to be able to hear nav instructions without disturbing passengers in my car. This headset did not do it at first, because it only work with the phone audio stream from the phone, not the medial stream. Fixed that with the "mono mono" app from the Google Play store. Regular version free, "Pro" version with additional features for 99¢ one-time payment. It now works exactly as I had hoped. Battery life etc. TBD.
customer_reviews.author: DoctorB

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it. Doesn’t work properly for more than two months with very little use
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I’ve bought this brand before for other items and they were amazing. This thing stopped working Correctly about 2 months in with sound and connection fully but I thought it was my phone, sadly mistaken when the charger stopped working and then even with a new one the charging port on the headphone no longer works. Amazon has no way to return the product after a few months which is horrible because a product like this should have a longer life than a few months, especially for the price. I most definitely would like a refund.
customer_reviews.author: C Azevedo Livestock

customer_reviews.title: Great gift of necessity
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset as a gift for my nephew. With the driving laws now of no handheld devices while driving, this was the perfect gift. The sound quality is excellent and the moveable mic is extremely convenient. The ear piece is soft and comfortable and he wears it for several hours at a time. The battery last him almost all week with intermittent usage. The Bluetooth connection is reliable and secure and he has had no issues of disconnect. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Great headset!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! Noise canceling and excellent sound!! I use it to work from home.. I have two kids in school at home and working full time with constant calls coming in all the time.. It works perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Megz

customer_reviews.title: People say that they are hearing lots of interference
customer_reviews.text: Seems to connect to phone but randomly disconnects priority even though Bluetooth settings say it's connected. Phone defaults to phone on calls answered rather than headset half the time, people tell me that they get lot's of interference when I'm using this headset, I got it for work for better communication than a standard earpiece but sadly it's lacking.
customer_reviews.author: BuyerUnknown

customer_reviews.title: Meets Expectations and You Can't Beat the Price
customer_reviews.text: Why it took me so long to purchase a wireless headset I don't know, but I am glad I waited for this product. Not only does it come up to the standards that I was expecting from a wireless headset -it went beyond . I was actually able to go 3 1/2 hours straight without having to re-charge the battery - that is fabulous . The ear piece is not as comfortable as I'd like but I managed. This is a great product I'm glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD, but needs better ear piece
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my home office so I didn't have to transport my other one to and from work. It is easy to set up despite the fact the instructions are a little light. These are perfect for thr occasional phone call, but after wearing them for 75% of the time yesterday, I wish the ear piece was a bit more comfortable. Otherwise, the sound was good both ways and it is a good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Williams

customer_reviews.title: A perfect solution for hands free cell phone usage while behind the wheel
customer_reviews.text: I really really like this hands free headset! I have purchased several other brands and this particular item has proved to be a invaluable tool. With police aggressively enforcing distracted driving laws these wireless sets are indispensable. The Bluetooth connection is solid and the sound quality far superior to the iPhone speaker. Good battery life too!
customer_reviews.author: Curt Chappell

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for but good for price.
customer_reviews.text: So overall the sound is just fine. It's a great and quick $20 fix to the need of such an item. My problem has been the range in which you can walk away from say a computer its connected to is short. The other issue I run into every day is that it randomly turns off and disconnects. Which isn't fun if you are working from home on the phone with a customer. But again for the price it's a good option to start with.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Yanagita

customer_reviews.title: Not good for someone with a large head.  It is difficult to hear when in a noisy place
customer_reviews.text: This headset sounds ok when used in an office or other quite location. The ear piece is rather small and not very comfortable if you happen to have a large head (like I do). It does not work well in the car as people that I spoke with said there is a lot background noise. It is also difficult to hear when in a noisy area. Bluetooth connectivity works well, and for the price it's not a total waste. I stopped using mine because it was also not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Schaker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Working from Home
customer_reviews.text: Since working from home, I had been using my airpods for business calls but it is cumbersome to use because 1) takes a few seconds to put on, 2) there is a lag before the phone connects. My clients would often ask if I was still on the phone. I bought this headset because it is the same design as the one I use at my office. The microphone is so good that when talking to my sister, I was preparing my lunch and slicing a tomato and she could hear me! The sound quality is really good, it is very comfortable, can be used all day on 1 charge. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Howell

customer_reviews.title: Decent but has a mind of it's own. Very reputable seller.
customer_reviews.text: I have a few of theses head sets and over all they are pretty decent, however at times when making a phone call it will go thru the head set and speaker phone and has to be switch from one or the other in order to carry on conversation. This is very annoying especially when trying to maintain hands free driving. As far a the seller, I can not express enough what a reputable seller this vendor is. Any issue the vendor has immediately responded , not sure if this glitch that I occasionally experience can be corrected.
customer_reviews.author: C. O.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Need to use it for work. I wear it 6+ hours a day. When not in use, I simply pull it down and it is very light weight on my neck and I sometime forget about it. Sound quality is good enough for me to hear, and for others to hear me. The adjustable metal part is great as well. I tried it on my 5 year old and 2 year old. They both can wear it without no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive headset with great quality
customer_reviews.text: A simple Bluetooth headset. Power button provides an audio tone to signal power on/off. Headset is light. Microphone boom is long enough to capture voice without distortion. Bluetooth connectivity is quick and easy. I synched this up to my phone in seconds. Voice quality is excellent. I switched between phone and headset during a conversation, and the person on the other end didn't even detect a change. Charges quickly. Seems to hold a charge for a while, although I have not timed the duration. I usually power off the headset and remove it when not on a conference call. Headset is just a bit tight, but then again I have a rather large cranium.
customer_reviews.author: F. J.  Van Wetering

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: A few months of use and no longer working
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this in July and it is no longer holding a charge. Very frustrating. I'd say skip this brand and try something more reliable. Had is lasted, we liked the features and fit. ***UPDATE: I reached out to the company and they have exhibited great Customer Service! I bumped up the rating because they went out of their way to make things right!
customer_reviews.author: Blessedgirl

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth headset for the $!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT headset for $20. It actually sounds better than a full headset from Pashion (BH M20) that I bought at the same time for $38. Crystal clear sound for me, and callers say they hear me very well. Good noise reduction as well. It does take a little while to get it to fit just right on your head. Would definitely recommend! The only negative is there is no way to tell how low the battery is getting (like the voice message in a Plantronics Bluetooth), but I have been on calls for several hours and it seems to do well. It recharges quickly too.
customer_reviews.author: eabwings

customer_reviews.title: Clear calls and easy to pair
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 4.5 stars if that were an option. Great headset for the price and the option to pair to a second device is what sold me on it. I have it paired to my laptop and cellphone. The only gripe I have is that you need to manually connect it every time to my second device, in this case my laptop. Not a huge deal, just an inconvenience. I spend maybe 1-2 hours on the phone a day and the battery hasn't let me down yet.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dodds

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bluetooth headset to use for work. Since I am sometimes in the office, working from home or from another work location, I was looking for a "trial", reasonably priced headset (in case it got left behind or damaged in transport) that provided good sound & voice for conference calls. Since my original purchase, I have made several additional purchased of this headset to give to my husband and coworkers. I have not felt the need to purchase a more expensive pair, because these have continue to do the job fabulously!
customer_reviews.author: TMaue

customer_reviews.title: Best headset I have tried by far!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this headset for 7 months now and I still love it. I use it every single day almost all day long for work and regular use on my cell phone. It is really easy to connect to bluetooth, the charge lasts a long time (I only charge it every other day even with using it literally all day long) and it is really durable. I throw it in my purse, in my car, etc and it still looks like I just bought it. Really comfortable fit and easy to adjust. Will absolutely purchase again once mine dies, I may even get a back up beforehand!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Battery problems make this a disposable component
customer_reviews.text: I don't buy things to throw them away. The battery last less than 8 months in 2 of the 3 purchased and the battery can't be replaced. Environmentally wasteful. The dealer kindly provided what they called an updated, improved version. I have not had it long enough to judge the battery but the shape of it is more bulky than original. With no sarcasm, I am not sure what was improved, sorry. I don't know if the battery is one of the improvements yet.
customer_reviews.author: Isa

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t even had this six months and it’s been losing functionality over the last three months. Today it finally crapped out. It use to only work when plugged in (with the cord provided). It no longer works plugged in or not. Basically you get what you pay for Updated: after my initial review I was sent another pair. While I’ve only had the new pair for a week they seem to be working well and like the other pair did in the beginning. My main complaint is distance. I can’t make it very far before they are cutting out.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S.

customer_reviews.title: Zero noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I need to use it in the car. I had a different one that was known as ' truckers noise cancelling head set' and THAT one worked like a charm, but it broke after a year's heavy use. This one has zero noise cancellation. It is VERY easy to use and a very good product. It does what it's supposed to do - It just doesn't cancel any background noise.
customer_reviews.author: Soccerdad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: This is my first bluetooth headset purchase and I made an excellent choice. I found the product through review articles and the recommendations on Amazon were already good. It was easy to set up. The hard part was finding a friend at home to test my sound settings, LOL. But eventually I was able to confirm that they could hear me very clearly. I've already used it on my latest shift to call voters and share information about voting options and great Democratic candidates. And I can stand up and stretch while calling so I don't get so tired. Easily used on either ear and comfortable to wear for hours - although I do switch ears every hour or so.
customer_reviews.author: susan sewell

customer_reviews.title: Edited: Decent headset for the price
customer_reviews.text: Edit: Updated review. The company selling this headset was nice enough to send me a new version of the headset since I had problems with the original set. The new one is fine. I can hear okay with it. My coworkers said they could hear me fine, but I'm a little quiet. The fit is a little weird, but workable. For the price, this headset is good. Old review: Brand new headset emitted a high-pitched squealing noise during all calls. I tried to use it for 15 minutes and it was giving me a headache. Returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Comfortable Headset
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to switch from a similar design in a wired headset. I like this unit much better than the wired design. The ear piece is comfortable, mic is in a good position and adjustable, sound quality is reasonable. Folks on the other end say I sound great, sound on my end (from the ear piece) is good but not great. the unit appears to be very sturdy considering how light it is. All-in-all I would buy this again, thinking about buying another to keep at the office.
customer_reviews.author: DJJJS

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice, little tight on my head.
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice, little tight on my head. I had Bluetooth that lets me know that I received a text message, some Bluetooth even read the text message to you and the really small and fits inside your ear. That part is they fall out of my ear. This one will only answer phone calls! It’s a little tight on my head I tried adjusting it I’m hoping it will stretch out a little bit . I just don’t wanted to fall off my head. My friend says it sounds really good, so there you have it. I hope it helps you to decide!
customer_reviews.author: D. Simpkins

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, would not pair with my phone.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price as well as the ratings (2nd of 10) that experts gave this set, however, my husband and I were unable to pair with my I Phone or His Samsung. I had no difficulty in returning it. Great Customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Farris

customer_reviews.title: Is it worth it?
customer_reviews.text: Me and my husband have been looking for a not so expensive headset/head phones but works great. I’m a stay at home mom so the whole idea of walking around with my phone glued to my ear when someone calls while trying to juggle with 3 toddlers, was not working. Neither putting it on speaker. So we decided to give this a chance and boyyyyy am I glad we did. The noise cancellation and sound quality is perfect. It’s super comfortable when placed in my ear. And the battery power!!! For me it lasted about 2 1/2 days before I had to charge it up again. Do I love the decision I made in getting it? I most definitely do!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Parline

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this a few times and really like it. Crisp and clear. I am using this for my home office. I connect it to two cell phones that I distribute calls between. I cannot speak to battery life (as far as how long it will last) but pairing it was easily done. The headset feels sturdy. Time will tell but its nice not getting a wire wrapped around something and having my headset pulled from my head. I may purchase a second set to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: George Sharp Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: So happy to have wireless headset for my cell phone. I have a Samsung J7 and this item synced easily and the microphone and ear piece seem to work fine. (My friend couldn't hear me until she put me on speaker phone, but I think that issue is on her side). Fast shipping all parts seem in working order, easy to charge battery. Instruction "booklet" could've been a lot larger, had to put on reading glasses to see pictures.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hawker

product_meta.title: Mpow Pro Trucker Bluetooth Headset V5.0, Wireless Headphones with Microphone for Cell Phone, Office Bluetooth Headset, CVC 6.0 Noise Canceling, On Ear Headphones for Call Center, Truck Driver, Skype
feature_bullets: BLUETOOTH 5.0 & WIRELESS FREEDOM -- With Bluetooth 5.0 technology, ensure Faster&Stable Connection.Pair easily with any two Bluetooth devices at one time. Roam range up to 30 feet from paired Bluetooth devices. Meet all your needs of calling.

BUILT FOR CLEAR CHAT -- Superior cVc6.0 Noise Cancelling Microphone blocks out unwanted noise. The mic is also adjustable to pick up your voices loud and clear. Provide crystal-clear conversations even in noisy environment.
16-Hrs TALKING TIME -- Offer up to 16 hours continuous talking time and 200 hours standby time with single fully charged in just 2 hours. Get enough juice to keep you productive all day.

LIGHTWEIGHT & COMFORTABLE -- The headset weights 1.6 oz (lighter than an egg). Enjoy extended comfort with padded earpad and flexible headband.Feel no burden during longer working sessions.The over-the-head BLUETOOTH HEADSET can be worn over the right or left ear according to your preferences.

COMPLY WITH FCC REGULATIONS - FCC ID 2AMH2-MBH15. This equipment has been tested and found to comply with the Radio frequency devices. Our bluetooth headset is not only designed for calling, but also support listening to music. Great idea for driver, call center, Skype chat, conference calls, webinar presentations and more.
Notice: Mute function only supports on cell phones at present, we are working on this feature so that it would be used on PCs in the future.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars10,442 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Additional Features: Lightweight, Noise cancelling microphone, Up to 12 hours talk time, Dual device connection, All day on-the-go comfort
specifications.Included Components: USB charging cable, Mpow Pro Headset, User manual
